alert.note: Alert for Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 27 at 8:26PM MDT until further notice by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Colorado, including the following counties, Morgan and Weld. * WHEN...Until 1130 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 826 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Jackson Reservoir, Orchard, Goodrich, Riverside Reservoir, New Raymer, Masters and Buckingham.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
